task_id.description: The unique identifier for the task associated with this time entry

task_name.description: The name of the task associated with this time entry

total_hours.description: The total number of hours spent on this time task

billable_hours.description: The number of hours that can be billed for this time task

currency.description: The currency in which the billable amount is calculated

billable_amount.description: The amount that can be billed for this time task

from.description: The starting time of the time task

to.description: The ending time of the time task
